CIRRICULUM VITAE 
Contact Details 
Name: Ha Tuan Bao  
Gender: Male 
Home Address: Nguyen Thuong Hien, Go Vap District, HCM City 
Cell Phone: 0827 04 8808 
Email: hatuanbao.ueh@gmail.com   
Profile  
 Senior .Net Developer with 4-year experience in web application development.   
 Good at problem solving. 
 Good at researching new technology. 
 Good at communicating in English.
